Jewish Baby Names

Search Results for: S Names

Alexander

Gender: Male

Meaning: Protector of Man. Jewish History: In the third century B.C.E., Alexander the Great spared Jerusalem from harm. In Alexander's honor, the high priest ordered that all Jewish males born in the city for a year were to be named after the leader.

Read more >>

Meaning: Protector of Man. Alexandra is the feminine version of Alexander.
